BIG BAD BRUCE

ROAD MAP

  • Stage 1: Promotion
    • Reserve 100 Big Bad Bruce NFTs for promotional giveaways (In progress)
    • Create social media accounts and a website for Big Bad Bruce to increase awareness and engagement (In progress)
    • Plan and execute a social media marketing campaign to promote Big Bad Bruce and the upcoming NFT release (Up next)
  • Stage 2: Charity
    • Establish connections with Animal Welfare League (QLD/NSW) to make donations towards re-homing lost and unwanted dogs (In progress)
    • Develop a strategy to communicate the charitable donations and create awareness (Up next)
    • Organize an event or campaign to raise funds for Animal Welfare League (Up next)
  • Stage 3: Merchandise
    • Create an online store to sell exclusive Big Bad Bruce merchandise to NFT holders (at discounts) and the general public (In progress)
    • Design and manufacture merchandise items (e.g. t-shirts, hats, keychains) (Up next)
    • Promote the merchandise store on social media and through other marketing channels (Up next)
